DOC.brief_summary: First experimental study ( Proof Of Concept ) investigate bowel function parameter ferment milk product probiotic alone association fiber potential effect .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Fermented Milk Product With Probiotics Alone Combination With Fibers Constipation Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Main eligibility criterion ( nonexhaustive list ) define : Healthy Caucasian subject gender , age 18 69 year Subject body mass index ( BMI ) 18 kg/m2 ( bound include ) 30 kg/m2 ( bound exclude ) Subjects moderate constipation define accord ROME III adapt criterion . Subjects without ongoing diagnose gastrointestinal disease complication . Subjects without previous ( within one month ) , ongoing plan therapy study drug alter bowel function . Subjects without know gluten intolerance , lactose intolerance allergy milk protein .
